verses.translation: In the Name of Allah.
May Allah bless Muhammad and his Household.
verses.transliteration: WA SALLA ALLAHU `ALA MUHAMMADIN WA ALIHI

verses.translation: “I confide my cause unto Allah.
Surely, Allah is Seer of His slaves.
So, Allah warded off from him the evils which they plotted.”
“There is no god save You. Be You Glorified!
Lo! I have been a wrongdoer.
Then, We heard his prayer and saved him from the anguish.
verses.transliteration: FASTAJABNA LAHU WA NAJJAYNAHU MINA ALGHAMMI

verses.translation: Thus do We save the believers.”
“Allah is Sufficient for us! Most Excellent is He in Whom we trust.
So, they returned with grace and favor from Allah,
verses.transliteration: FANQALABU BINI`MATIN MINA ALLAHI WA FADLIN

verses.translation: and no harm touched them.”
Only that which Allah wills shall come to pass.

verses.text: لاَ حَوْلَ وَلاَ قُوَّةَ إِلاَّ بِٱللَّهِ
verses.translation: There is neither strength nor power save with Allah.
verses.transliteration: LA HAWLA WA LA QUWWATA ILLA BILLAHI

verses.text: مَا شَاءَ ٱللَّهُ لاَ مَا شَاءَ ٱلنَّاسُ
verses.translation: Only that which Allah, but not people, wills shall come to pass.
verses.transliteration: MA SHA'A ALLAHU LA MA SHA'A ALNNASU

verses.text: مَا شَاءَ ٱللَّهُ وَإِنْ كَرِهَ ٱلنَّاسُ
verses.translation: Only that which Allah wills shall come to pass even if people detest it.
verses.transliteration: MA SHA'A ALLAHU WA IN KARIHA ALNNASU

verses.translation: Sufficient for me is the Lord against the lorded.
Sufficient for me is the Creator against the creatures.
Sufficient for me is the Sustainer against the sustained.
Sufficient for me is Allah, the Lord of the worlds.
Sufficient for me is He Who is sufficient for me.
Sufficient for me is He Who has been always sufficient for me.

verses.text: حَسْبِي مَنْ كَانَ مُذْ كُنْتُ لَمْ يَزَلْ حَسْبِي
verses.translation: Sufficient for me is He Who had been since eternity and still sufficient for me.
verses.transliteration: HASBI MAN KANA MUDH KUNTU LAM YAZAL HASBI

verses.text: حَسْبِيَ ٱللَّهُ لاَ إِلٰهَ إِلاَّ هُوَ
verses.translation: “Allah suffices me. There is no god save Him.
verses.transliteration: HASBIYA ALLAHU LA ILAHA ILLA HUWA

verses.translation: In Him have I put my trust,
and He is the Lord of the Tremendous Throne.”

verses.text: لاَ إِلٰهَ إِلاَّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ ٱلْحَلِيمُ
verses.translation: There is no god save Allah, the All-great and Most Forbearing.
verses.transliteration: LA ILAHA ILLA ALLAHU AL`AZIMU ALHALIMU

verses.text: لاَ إِلٰهَ إِلاَّ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّ ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْكَرِيـمِ
verses.translation: There is no god save Allah, the Lord of the Throne of Honor.
verses.transliteration: LA ILAHA ILLA ALLAHU RABBU AL`ARSHI ALKARIMU

verses.translation: All praise be to Allah, the Lord of the worlds.
O Allah, I ask You for the motives of Your mercy,
the determining causes of Your forgiveness,
the advantage of each act of kindness,
and the safeguarding against each and every sin.

verses.text: اَللَّهُمَّ لاَ تَدَعْ لِي ذَنْباً إِلاَّ غَفَرْتَهُ
verses.translation: O Allah, (please) do not leave any of my offenses unforgiven,
verses.transliteration: ALLAHUMMA LA TADA` LI DHANBAN ILLA GHAFARTAHU

verses.translation: any of my misfortunes unrelieved,
any of my ailments unhealed,
any of my defects uncovered,
any (item of my) sustenance not including (me),
any fear (that I experience) unsecured,
any evil (that comes upon me) uncontrollable,

verses.text: وَلاَ حَاجَةً هِيَ لَكَ رِضاً وَلِيَ فيهَا صَلاَحٌ إِلاَّ قَضَيْتَهَا
verses.translation: and any need that achieves Your satisfaction and my benefit unanswered.
verses.transliteration: WA LA HAJATAN HIYA LAKA RIDAN WA LIYA FIHA SALAHUN ILLA QADAYTAHA

verses.translation: O most Merciful of all those who show mercy.
(please) Respond, O Lord of the worlds.

verses.text: أَسْتَغْفِرُ ٱللَّهَ ٱلَّذِي لاَ إِلٰهَ إِلاَّ هُوَ
verses.translation: I pray the forgiveness of Allah; there is no god save Him,
verses.transliteration: ASTAGHFIRU ALLAHA ALLADHI LA ILAHA ILLA HUWA

verses.translation: the Ever-living, the Self-Subsisting,
the All-compassionate, the All-merciful,
and the Lord of Majesty and Honor.
And I ask Him to accept my repentance,
like His acceptance of the repentance of a slave who is submissive, acquiescent,
poor, miserable,
despondent, dejected, seeking refuge (with Him),

verses.text: لاَ يَمْلِكُ لِنَفْسِهِ نَفْعَاً وَلاَ ضَرّاً
verses.translation: not controlling for himself any harm or profit,
verses.transliteration: LA YAMLIKU LINAFSIHI NAF`AN WA LA DARRAN

verses.text: وَلاَ مَوْتاً وَلاَ حَيَاةً وَلاَ نُشُوراً
verses.translation: and not controlling death nor life nor raising (the dead) to life.
verses.transliteration: WA LA MAWTAN WA LA HAYATAN WA LA NUSHURAN

verses.text: ا َللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ نَفْسٍ لاَ تَشْبَعُ
verses.translation: O Allah, I surely seek Your protection against a self that never has enough,
verses.transliteration: ALLAHUMMA INNI A`UDHU BIKA MIN NAFSIN LA TASHBA`U

verses.translation: a heart that does not feel apprehension,
knowledge that does not avail,
a prayer that is not accepted,
and a supplication that is not responded.

verses.text: اَللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ ٱلْيُسْرَ بَعْدَ ٱلْعُسْرِ
verses.translation: O Allah, I surely beseech You for easiness after difficulty,
verses.transliteration: ALLAHUMMA INNI AS'ALUKA ALYUSRA BA`DA AL`USRI

verses.translation: relief after misfortune,
and comfort after hardship.

verses.text: اَللَّهُمَّ مَا بِنَا مِنْ نِعْمَةٍ فَمِنْكَ
verses.translation: O Allah, You are certainly the source of each and every favor that covers us.
verses.transliteration: ALLAHUMMA MA BINA MIN NI`MATIN FAMINKA

verses.translation: There is no god save You.
I pray Your forgiveness and repent before You.
O Allah! I beseech You for the motives of Your mercy,
the determining causes of Your forgiveness,

verses.text: وَٱلنَّجَاةَ مِنَ ٱلنَّارِ وَمِنْ كُلِّ بِلِيَّةٍ
verses.translation: deliverance from Hellfire and all misfortunes,
verses.transliteration: WALNNAJATA MINA ALNNARI WA MIN KULLI BALIYYATIN

verses.text: وَٱلْفَوْزَ بِٱلْجَنَّةِ وَٱلرِّضْوَانِ في دَارِ ٱلسَّلاَمِ
verses.translation: winning Paradise,Divine Contentment in the Abode of Peace,
verses.transliteration: WALFAWZA BILJANNATI WALRRIDWANI FI DARI ALSSALAMI

verses.text: وَجَوَارِ نَبِيِّكَ مُحَمَّدٍ عَلَيْهِ وَآلِهِ ٱلسَّلاَمُ
verses.translation: and the vicinity of Your Prophet Muhammad—peace be upon him and his Household.
verses.transliteration: WA JIWARI NABIYYIKA MUHAMMADIN `ALAYHI WA ALIHI ALSSALAMU

verses.text: اَللَّهُمَّ مَا بِنَا مِنْ نِعْمَةٍ فَمِنْكَ
verses.translation: O Allah, You are certainly the source of each and every favor that covers us.
verses.transliteration: ALLAHUMMA MA BINA MIN NI`MATIN FAMINKA

verses.translation: There is no god save You.
I pray Your forgiveness and I repent before You.

verses.text: اَللَّهُمَّ إِنَّهُ لَيْسَ لِي عِلْمٌ بِمَوْضِعِ رِزْقِي
verses.translation: O Allah! verily, I lack acquaintance with the place of my sustenance;
verses.transliteration: ALLAHUMMA INNAHU LAYSA LI `ILMUN BIMAWADI`I RIZQI

verses.text: وَإِنَّمَا أَطْلُبُهُ بِخَطَرَاتٍ تَخْطُرُ عَلَىٰ قَلْبِي
verses.translation: rather, I am seeking it owing to ideas that come upon my mind.
verses.transliteration: WA INNMA ATLUBUHU BIKHATARATIN TAKHTURU `ALA QALBI

verses.translation: I consequently wander in countries searching for it.
By doing such, I am as confused as the confounded,

verses.text: لاَ أَدْرِي أَفِي سَهْلٍ هَوُ أَمْ فِي جَبَلٍ
verses.translation: since I do not know whether my sustenance lies in a plain, on a mountain,
verses.transliteration: LA ADRI AFI SAHLIN HUWA AM FI JABALIN

verses.text: أَمْ في أَرْضٍ أَمْ في سَمَاءٍ
verses.translation: on the ground, in the air,
verses.transliteration: AM FI ARDIN AM FI SAMA'IN

verses.text: أَمْ فِي بَرٍّ أَمْ فِي بَحْرٍ
verses.translation: on lands, in seas,
verses.transliteration: AM FI BARRIN AM FI BAHRIN

verses.translation: at whose hands,
or who the source of it is.
I have full knowledge that You know all these,
the causes of them are in Your Hands,
and it is You Who distribute it out of Your compassion
and cause it out of Your mercy.
O Allah, please send blessings to Muhammad and his Household

verses.text: وَٱجْعَلْ يَا رَبِّ رِزْقَكَ لِي وَاسِعاً
verses.translation: and make, O Lord, Your sustenance that is provided (by You) to me expansive,
verses.transliteration: WAJ`AL YA RABBI RIZQAKA LI WASI`AN

verses.translation: my seeking for it easy for me,
and its source close to me.

verses.text: وَلاَ تُعَنِّنِي بِطَلَبِ مَا لَمْ تُقَدِّرْ لِي فيهِ رِزْقاً
verses.translation: Please, do not fatigue me by seeking that which You have not decided for me to take,
verses.transliteration: WA LA TU`ANNINI BITALBI MA LAM TUQADDIRU LI FIHI RIZQAN

verses.translation: because You are certainly in no need for tormenting me
while I am in full need for Your mercy.
(Please) Send blessings upon Muhammad and his Household
and confer liberally upon me, Your slave, out of Your graciousness.
You are surely the Lord of great favor.

verses.text: اللّهُمّ كُنْ لِوَلِيّكَ الحُجّةِ ابْنِ الحَسَنِ
verses.translation: O Allah, be, for Your representative, the Hujjat (proof), son of Al ­Hassan,
Your blessings be on him and his forefathers,

verses.text: فِي هذِهِ السَّاعَةِ وَفي كُلّ سَاعَةٍ
verses.translation: in this hour and in every hour,
verses.transliteration: FEE HAAZEHIS SAA-A'TE WA FEE KULLE SAA-A'TIN

verses.translation: a guardian, a protector,
a leader, a helper,
a proof, and an eye,
Until You make him live on the earth, in obedience (to You),
and cause him to live in it for a long time
In the Name of Allah, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.

verses.text: اَلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلْأَوَّلِ قَبْلَ ٱلْإِنْشَاءِ وَٱلْإِحْيَاءِ
verses.translation: All praise be to Allah, the First before the bringing forth and the giving of life,
verses.transliteration: ALHAMDU LILLAHI AL-AWWALI QABLA AL-INSHA'I WAL-IHYA'I

verses.translation: and the Last after the annihilation of all things,

verses.text: ٱلْعَلِيمِ ٱلَّذِي لاَ يَنْسَىٰ مَنْ ذَكَرَهُ
verses.translation: the All-knowing Who forgets not him who remembers Him,
verses.transliteration: AL`ALIMI ALLADHI LA YANSA MAN DHAKARAHU

verses.translation: decreases not him who thanks Him,
disappoints not him who supplicates Him,
and cuts not off the hope of him who hopes in Him!
verses.transliteration: WA LA YAQTA`U RAJA'A MAN RAJAHU

verses.translation: O Allah, I call You to witness
and You are sufficient Witness
and I call to witness all Your angels,
the inhabitants of Your heavens,
the bearers of Your Throne,
Your prophets and Your messengers whom You have sent out,
verses.transliteration: WA MAN BA`ATHTA MIN ANBIYA'IKA WA RUSULIKA

verses.translation: and the various kinds of creatures You have brought forth,
that I bear witness that You are Allah;
there is no god but You, You alone,
Who have no associate nor any equal,
and Your word has no failing, nor any change;
verses.transliteration: WA LA KHULFA LIQAWLIKA WA LA TABDILA

verses.text: وَ أَنَّ مُحَمَّداً صَلَّىٰ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَآلِهِ عَبْدُكَ وَرَسُولُكَ
verses.translation: and that Muhammad, Allah bless him and his Household, is Your servant and Your messenger;
verses.transliteration: WA ANNA MUHAMMADAN SALLA ALLAHU `ALAYHI WA ALIHI `ABDUKA WA RASULUKA

verses.translation: he delivered to the servants that with which You charged him,

verses.text: وَجَاهَدَ فِي ٱللَّهِ عَزَّ وَجَلَّ حَقَّ ٱلْجِهَادِ
verses.translation: struggled for Allah as is His due,
verses.transliteration: WA JAHADA FI ALLAHI `AZZA WA JALLA HAQQA ALJIHADI

verses.text: وَ أَنَّهُ بَشَّرَ بِما هُوَ حَقُّ مِنَ ٱلثَّوابِ
verses.translation: gave the good news of the truth of reward,
verses.transliteration: WA ANNAHU BASHSHARA BIMA HUWA HAQQUN MIN ALTHTHAWABI

verses.text: وَ أَنْذَرَ بِما هُوَ صِدْقٌ مِنَ ٱلعِقَابِ
verses.translation: and warned of the veracity of punishment.
verses.transliteration: WA ANDHARA BIMA HUWA SIDQUN MIN AL`IQABI

verses.text: اَللَّهُمَّ ثَبِّتْنِي عَلَىٰ دِينِكَ مَا أَحْيَيْتَنِي
verses.translation: O Allah, make me firm in Your religion as long as You keep me alive,

verses.text: وَلاَ تُزِغْ قَلْبِي بَعْدَ إِذْ هَدَيْتَنِي
verses.translation: make not my heart swerve after You have guided me,
verses.transliteration: WA LA TUZIGH QALBI BA`DA IDH HADAYTANI

verses.translation: and give me mercy from You,
verses.transliteration: WA HAB LI MIN LADUNKA RAHMATAN

verses.translation: surely, You are the All-bestower.
Bless Muhammad and the Household of Muhammad,
make me one of his followers and his partisans,
muster me in his band,
and give me the success of accomplishing the obligatory observance of Fridays,

verses.text: وَمَا أَوْجَبْتَ عَلَيَّ فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلطَّاعَاتِ
verses.translation: performing the acts of obedience which You have made incumbent upon me within it,
verses.transliteration: WA MA AWJABTA `ALAYYA FIHA MIN ATTA`ATI

verses.translation: and receiving the bestowal which You have apportioned for its people
on the Day of Recompense!
Surely, You are the Almighty, the All-wise!
